name: PolyGUN (or something)
description:
=CONTROLS=
WASD / ARROWS to MOVE
MOUSE to AIM
MOUSE CLICK to SHOOT

=ABOUT=
PolyGUN is a 2D multiplayer top-down shooter made in Unity, using the Photon Network. This was my first time creating a multiplayer game, so I kept things simple. Players can choose their nickname and then easily hop into or create a new server in order to compete with each other in a sandbox free-for-all. It can get very chaotic, but in a good way.

It was fun to try something new, both in terms of gameplay and graphical style. I would have liked to add in actual timed-matches, but had trouble figuring it out due to still being new to multiplayer development. Still, I'm very proud of the project and think it turned out fun.
